forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. East wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
